trans-unit.source: Our platform uses blockchain technology to secure your assets and we employ regular audits to our system to protect the confidentiality and integrity of your information.
Our platform is designed to be easy to use and accessible to all. With user-friendly interfaces and detailed documentation, anyone can take advantage of the power of our blockchain technology.
Our platform is open source, allowing for a collaborative and transparent community of developers and users. This helps to ensure that our platform remains reliable and up-to-date.
Trust, Secure, Safe: Committing to Reliability.

ChainBrary is a platform that aims to make blockchain technology more accessible to everyone by providing users with a library of open-source and secure tools for building and interacting with blockchain applications.
How to show a picture on the blockchain?
Files aren't stored on the blockchain to avoid high costs and network congestion; they're externally hosted and referenced for efficient, decentralized access.
How can I quickly host my file somewhere?
The image was found on the blockchain and it's ready to be displayed.

1. Go to Google Drive 2. Click on "+ New" > Then "New File" 3. Upload your file 4. Right click on the file > "Get shareable link" 5. Copy the link and paste it here 6. Make sure the image will be accessible at anytime
1. Go to Post Image 2. Click on "Choose images" 3. Upload your file 4. Copy the "Direct link" and paste it here 5. Make sure the image will be accessible at anytime
The URL provided does not have any pictures attached
Discover Chainbrary: Your Safe, User-Friendly Blockchain Starter Kit. Begin with ease, backed by our commitment to your security.
Creating your bid... Please confirm the request on your wallet.
Network is not matching with wallet
Network is not supported, please change from wallet
You must accept the terms and conditions
Please add at least one image
Please enter a value higher than the current bid
We are currently approchaing the end of the auction. Please make sure to submit your bid with a higher value of fee to ensure that your transaction will be processed in time.
An extra of 10 minutes will be added to the auction if a bid is placed within the last 10 minutes of the auction.
Your withdrawal request has been processed successfully. Below are the transaction details:
Transaction ID: Amount Withdrawn: View on Etherscan
No bids have been placed yet. Be the first!
Bidding has ended without any participation.
Bid address must be a valid address
You are about to withdraw your bid. Please review the details below carefully. Note that a withdrawal fee will be deducted from the total amount. This action cannot be undone.

Effortlessly initiate and propagate bids among your peers. This feature has been fine-tuned for the network's native tokens, ensuring seamless integration and reliability. Dive into the bidding process with enhanced transparency and full control, while catering to your specific requirements within the network's ecosystem.

Kickstart your bidding process with 'Create a Bid.' Tailor your bid with ease, ensuring a secure and straightforward setup. Ideal for diverse offerings, this feature simplifies launching bids on our decentralized platform.

Dive into existing bids with 'Join a Bid.' Find and participate in bids that align with your interests. Our platform offers a seamless and secure way to engage with the decentralized bidding community.
A connected wallet is necessary to see the the progress of the bid.
Creating your bid... Please confirm the request on your wallet. This could take 5 minutes, please stay on this page.

The bid you are seeking cannot be found on this network. Please verify that you have entered the correct address and are on the appropriate network. Please check the URL or go back to the search page.

Please be aware that confirmation times for recent bids can vary due to network conditions. For the latest status, kindly refresh this page. If your transaction is still processing, you can track it here: . Thank you for your patience.

This document is securely locked and stored using advanced blockchain technology, ensuring unmatched security and integrity. Access to its content is exclusively reserved for the document's owner and the initial purchaser, reflecting a new standard in document privacy and ownership.
This document has already been unlocked by another user. This means that the content of this document is only accessible to the owner of the document and the user who unlocked it first.
This description is only visible for the owner of the document and the first buyer. Make sure your screen is not recorded
This description is only visible for the owner of the document and the first buyer. Make sure your screen is not recorded.

The detailed description of this document remains securely locked. Full access to this content will be granted upon completion of the contract payment, ensuring exclusive access for authorized parties.
As the owner of this document, this is currently unlocked for you. You can see the full content of this by clicking here. Make sure your screen is not shared with anyone else. Unlock here
Payment is processing and may take a few minutes. Once confirmed from your wallet, refresh to unlock the document. If there are any issues, the transaction will be reverted.
Network is not matching with wallet
Price has to be greater than 0
Accept terms and conditions. 0.1% of community fee will be deducted from the final transaction.
You must accept the terms and conditions.

Explore the pinnacle of document security with our Document Locker. Utilizing cutting-edge blockchain technology, we offer an unparalleled level of protection and privacy for your valuable documents. This service is tailored for those who demand the highest standards of security and exclusive access.
Protect your documents with our blockchain-based Document Locker, ensuring exclusive access and utmost privacy.
To retrieve the current conversion rate, ensure the appropriate network is selected in your wallet
Your current network is not supported. Please switch to a compatible network. For assistance or to share your suggestions with our community, join us on Discord.
A connected wallet is required for conversion rates.
A wallet address must start with 0x
Name must be less than 20 characters
Enter your wallet address to receive funds
You're requesting $USD . Rest assured, the transaction will be initiated to precisely match this amount, irrespective of any token volatility.
Attention: This is a preview of your request. Avoid the mistake of self-payment.
You've reached ChainBrary's secure payment portal. Fast, secure, and reliable cryptocurrency transactions start here. Verify, confirm, and go!
Please be connected on the network to use this feature.
is requesting a sum equivalent to $ USD. To ensure accuracy, the transaction will be precisely calculated to match this amount in prior to processing the payment.

Easily generate and share payment requests via URL or QR code. This feature primarily focuses on creating payment requests, allowing users to lock in prices in USD, ensuring accuracy despite token value fluctuations. A variety of tokens are available to accommodate diverse needs.
